comment: A universal vertex has ` n - 1 ` neighbors in a finite simple graph with ` n ` vertices. A biconditional version of ~ nbusgrvtxm1uvtx resp. ~ uvtxnm1nbgr . (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 14-Jul-2018.) (Revised by AV, 16-Dec-2020.)
